title: Premium 3D Product Configurators for Manufacturers and Retailers | Missoun
description: The Missoun visual commerce platform helps manufacturers of complex and highly configurable products to create immersive 3D configurators that drive conversions.
markdown:
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/645cf279fc8ee6d3acbd3293_company-logo.webp)](https://www.missoun.com/)

# 3D CPQ. Built for complexity. Delivered fast

Sell configurable products faster. Align sales and engineering. Eliminate data duplication and costly integrations.

[Request a Demo](https://calendly.com/michele-sciuto-missoun/meet-missoun) [Why Missoun](https://www.missoun.com/why-missoun)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68befe39e975e84c3535eed9_1080v3-XL30.gif)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68bfed906c80d960f012f888_new-mockup%201%20(6).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68b583c785c9b2f4b980fb4b_Frame%20(3).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68befe39e975e84c3535eed9_1080v3-XL30.gif)

## Built for Modern Manufacturers

### Deploy in weeks, not months

Go live fast and start seeing ROI

immediately

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68b57937fd3c36b689d4204a_Group%201991429161%20(2).png)

### Empower your sales network

With advanced 3D CPQ — faster, smarter, and

error-free

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68bbb09bf0c2511062e140fb_Frame%201991431329.png)

### Eliminate spreadsheets and legacy systems

Сonsolidate and modernize your stack

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68b57569133555800213f5b9_Group%201991429160.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68b57555a70ab6fafa07b9c5_Frame%201991429314.png)

### Deliver new features in days

Built by your business teams using low-code

tools

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68b578a9364a8b5310dd5ff4_fd61c80d00344b25692aa90fe396ea8cdbd3eee6.png)

## Configure, visualize and sell

Unlock immersive 3D experiences and let customers configure products instantly. Make interactive visuals drive your sales.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68b6b9621b1b3708a618cd0f_Boat%20CPQ.png)\\
\\
Setup and Go\\
\\
17s](https://www.missoun.com/#)

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68b6b9621b1b3708a618cd0f_Boat%20CPQ.png)](https://demo.configurator.test.missoun.com/products/701d9f88-b7b8-4fc3-ab45-a0d9b44fa2ef)

## Backed by Siemens. Trusted by Manufacturers.

# Missoun is a Siemens technology partner.

“Our 3D CPQ platform is promoted by Siemens as a recommended solution for Teamcenter PLM customers — with direct integration and zero data duplication.”

[View on Siemens Marketplace](https://xcelerator.siemens.com/global/en/all-offerings/products/3d-product-configurator.html)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68b570dc6d65d2e45b17274f_Group%201991429127%20(1)%201.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68b56fc08b4c48ec1ccac2ab_Group%201991429158%20(1)%201.png)

# Tatra Trucks – Modernizing Industrial Sales

Tatra Trucks, one of the world’s oldest truck manufacturers, chose Missoun to power a next-generation dealer portal and CPQ system

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68afe924fad6ca16b2c2966c_Vector%20(7).png)

Standardized quoting for global dealer and internal sales teams

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68afe92436518ee5f771d2e9_Group%20(1).png)

Direct integration with Teamcenter PLM, no data duplication

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68afe924386ea897d2c2b736_Frame%20(1).png)

Dynamic BOM resolution based on customer-selected options

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/68afe92440ad1269f90ef4aa_Frame%20(2).png)

Real-time 3D configuration for highly customized vehicles

[Read the full story](https://www.missoun.com/resources/missoun-drives-into-the-automotiveindustry-with-leading-truck-manufacturer)

title: Increase Sales for Mobility Brands with 3D Customization
description: Missoun’s 3D visual tools boost conversions by 40% and reduce returns by 35%, creating immersive, personalized shopping experiences for bikes, scooters, and cars.
markdown:
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/645cf279fc8ee6d3acbd3293_company-logo.webp)](https://www.missoun.com/)

# Next-Level Mobility

Create Immersive Shopping Experiences that Drive Growth and Customer Loyalty

[Book a demo](https://calendly.com/michele-sciuto-missoun/meet-missoun)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6849a7a156abbaac58ac1505_hero%20img.avif)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6849a7ac93e338c495adcfeb_Verticale-L30.gif)

## Personalized Purchases

Let customers build their perfect product by choosing sizes, colors, components, and accessories. Real-time configuration ensures every choice is visible instantly, increasing confidence and conversion rates.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/684474bb57bf156a6111f546_Personalized%20Purchases%20Image.avif)

Higher Revenue

Tailored Experience

Stronger Loyalty

## Boost Customer Engagement

Interactive 3D experiences keep users on your site longer and drive deeper product exploration. Customers can view, rotate, and customize mobility products in real time—creating a memorable digital experience.

Sales Uplift

### Increase in conversion rates

40%

Talk to one of our experts

[Get in Touch](https://www.missoun.com/contact-us)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/684474bb1e484e2da48cfcc9_Car%20Image.avif)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/684474ba8a93f372dc463d94_Engaging%20Digital%20Showroom.avif)

## Engaging Digital Showroom

Tailored Experience

Customers interact with products in 3D, exploring every detail up close.

Higher Engagement

Boosts interaction by 66%, keeping customers on your site longer.

In-Store Feel Online

Creates a digital showroom that rivals the physical shopping experience.

Talk to one of our experts

[Get in Touch](https://www.missoun.com/contact-us)

Raising engagement

60%

Increase in customer engagement

## **Accelerate Go-to-Market for New Models**

Launch new models with 3D assets even before physical inventory is available, allowing early marketing, pre-orders, and demand validation.

[Get in Touch](https://www.missoun.com/contact-us)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6849a6c5dab00bd7c42fcf59_Reducing%20Returns.avif)

## Differentiating Your Brand in a Crowded Market

In the competitive mobility market, 3D visual commerce gives your brand adistinct edge, increasing customer loyalty and driving repeat business. Companies that adopt 3D technology report higher customer retention and brand differentiation.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/684474ba62d43bd8456fe4c4_santos%20logo.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/684685c417dd14854e2669ab_santos%20cycle.avif)](https://3d-color-customizer.santosbikes.com/products/ddc1e188-666f-49de-a8d9-058a5ea1996e)

title: 3D Product Configurator for Manufacturers and Retailers | Missoun
description: The Missoun visual commerce platform helps manufacturers of complex and highly configurable products to create immersive 3D configurators that drive conversions.
markdown:

Missoun transforms the sales experience, allowing brands and their dealers to configure and sell any product with ease.

[Book a Demo](https://www.missoun.com/italian/contact-us)

[open lightbox](https://www.missoun.com/italian/old-home-1#)

## Make your products configurable and sell them at scale

The Missoun platform is designed to manage **product complexity of any kind**, making 3D Visual Commerce accessible to all brands.

![Engineering PLM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50d2255a2953f1612bf_Marketing-megaphone-regular.svg)

### Marketing

Transform the customer experience with an immersive 3D and AR product visualization

![Configuration CPQ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50df13f321a4432c573_Sales-chart-simple-regular.svg)

### Sales

Simplify the buying process by offering a user-friendly method for creating the desired product with real-time visualizations

![Sales CPQ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50dc7649908a30848b8_Manufaturing-industry-regular.svg)

### Manufacturing

Connect marketing, sales and manufacturing to automatically generate an order for each customer configuration

## Increase sales and improve customer satisfaction

[![3D Product Configurator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/65685649e5fb9fb16ae4ae9c_yatch%20macbook.webp)\\
\\
Meet Missoun\\
\\
34s](https://www.missoun.com/italian/old-home-1#)

[![Engineering PLM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50d2255a2953f1612bf_Marketing-megaphone-regular.svg)\\
Marketing](https://www.missoun.com/italian/old-home-1#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0) [![Configuration CPQ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50df13f321a4432c573_Sales-chart-simple-regular.svg)\\
Sales](https://www.missoun.com/italian/old-home-1#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1) [![Sales CPQ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50dc7649908a30848b8_Manufaturing-industry-regular.svg)\\
Manufacturing](https://www.missoun.com/italian/old-home-1#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2)

**Increase Conversion Rates**

3D visuals boost understanding, enhancing confidence and increasing conversion rates for informed purchasing decisions.

**Innovative Brands** Utilizing 3D positions brands as innovative, providing modern, immersive experiences, fostering positive brand image and differentiation.

**Longer Time Spent on Website** Interactive 3D captivates, extending user engagement for personalized experiences, improving brand perception, and increasing conversions.

**Reduce Costs for Photo Shooting** 3D eliminates costly photoshoots, offering flexible, cost-effective digital models for various marketing materials, reducing production expenses.

**Customer Engagement** 3D marketing fosters deep engagement, involving customers in product personalization, strengthening brand loyalty and encouraging repeat visits.

**Reduce Time to Market** 3D expedites product development, reducing time to market, ensuring agility to meet consumer demands promptly.

[Book a demo](https://www.missoun.com/italian/contact-us)

![Item CAD](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/65657c4351f5031f3cf1b925_Marketing%20Tab.webp)

**Increase E-commerce Sales:**

**‍** Boost online sales through immersive 3D product experiences for customers.

**Precision with Guided Selling:** Eliminate order errors by guiding customers through accurate product configurations in 3D.

**Empower Dealers with Virtual Inventory:** Dealers sell beyond physical inventory, expanding offerings through 3D visualization.

**Amplify Sales Impact:** Equip your sales team to sell more effectively using the persuasive power of 3D.

**Lower Return Rates:** Reduce returns by ensuring customers confidently choose products through enhanced 3D views.

[Book a demo](https://www.missoun.com/italian/contact-us)

![Variant management PLM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/65657c6197e151b908db1dca_Sales%20Tab.webp)

**Automated BOM Resolution:** Instantly resolve bills of materials for customer-defined configurations, saving time and effort compared to manual processes.

**Effortless Scheduling:** Automated production order creation enhances order scheduling, minimizing unplanned downtime and optimizing resource allocation for increased efficiency.

**Reduced Prep Time:** Automatically link resolved BOMs to production orders for seamless traceability, streamlining the entire production process.

**Avoid Production Issues:** Eliminate the risk of assembling incorrect components by automating BOM resolution and production order creation, ensuring accuracy in manufacturing.

**Reduce Inventory Issues:** Easily deactivate unavailable parts in configurations, preventing orders for undeliverable products and enhancing overall inventory management.

[Book a demo](https://www.missoun.com/italian/contact-us)

![3D Configurator CPQ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/65657c9a72f80ca1702a04ba_Manufacturing%20Tab%201.webp)

## Bring visual immersive experience anywhere

Missoun platform boosts sales bringing life to virtual products.

![Bill of materials](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/65657d09b9576a75a4f8daee_Missoun-Architecture_2650.webp)

## Boost your ERP investment

Connect configurable product development and sales to planning, procurement and accounting processes.

Use Missoun to fully digitalise your business processes and maximise investments in your management system.

![Bill of materials resolution PLM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/63307645fa208d89168c00ce_missoun_bom_resolved.webp)

## Enterprise-grade architecture

Scalability, interoperability, and security are at the core of the Missoun platform.

Cloud Native

Built on the cloud-native Siemens low-code platform that ensures business velocity and growth.

![Cloud native](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6342f6b43ef0a50949487da5_cloud-regular.svg)

Open

Designed with an APIs first approach to guarantee easy integration with existing systems.

![Open platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6342f6b4e3265c33ab45749d_lock-open-regular.svg)

Secure

Encrypt all data in transit and at-rest and run on ISO 27001 and SOC 1,2,3 certified cloud to protect intellectual property.

![Secure platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6342f6b44078362d67f20a5d_shield-regular.svg)

## Want to know more?

Send us your questions, ask for a demo or request a video call.

[Contact Us](https://www.missoun.com/italian/contact-us)

title: 3D Product Configurator for Manufacturers and Retailers | Missoun
description: The Missoun visual commerce platform helps manufacturers of complex and highly configurable products to create immersive 3D configurators that drive conversions.
markdown:

Missoun transforms the sales experience, allowing brands and their dealers to configure and sell any product with ease.

## Make your products configurable and sell them at scale

The Missoun platform is designed to manage **product complexity of any kind**, making 3D Visual Commerce accessible to all brands.

![Engineering PLM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50d2255a2953f1612bf_Marketing-megaphone-regular.svg)

### Marketing

Transform the customer experience with an immersive 3D and AR product visualization

![Configuration CPQ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50df13f321a4432c573_Sales-chart-simple-regular.svg)

### Sales

Simplify the buying process by offering a user-friendly method for creating the desired product with real-time visualizations

![Sales CPQ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50dc7649908a30848b8_Manufaturing-industry-regular.svg)

### Manufacturing

Connect marketing, sales and manufacturing to automatically generate an order for each customer configuration

## Increase sales and improve customer satisfaction

[![3D Product Configurator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/65685649e5fb9fb16ae4ae9c_yatch%20macbook.webp)\\
\\
Meet Missoun\\
\\
34s](https://www.missoun.com/old-home-1#)

[![Engineering PLM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50d2255a2953f1612bf_Marketing-megaphone-regular.svg)\\
Marketing](https://www.missoun.com/old-home-1#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0) [![Configuration CPQ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50df13f321a4432c573_Sales-chart-simple-regular.svg)\\
Sales](https://www.missoun.com/old-home-1#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1) [![Sales CPQ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6569d50dc7649908a30848b8_Manufaturing-industry-regular.svg)\\
Manufacturing](https://www.missoun.com/old-home-1#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2)

**Increase Conversion Rates**

3D visuals boost understanding, enhancing confidence and increasing conversion rates for informed purchasing decisions.

**Innovative Brands** Utilizing 3D positions brands as innovative, providing modern, immersive experiences, fostering positive brand image and differentiation.

**Longer Time Spent on Website** Interactive 3D captivates, extending user engagement for personalized experiences, improving brand perception, and increasing conversions.

**Reduce Costs for Photo Shooting** 3D eliminates costly photoshoots, offering flexible, cost-effective digital models for various marketing materials, reducing production expenses.

**Customer Engagement** 3D marketing fosters deep engagement, involving customers in product personalization, strengthening brand loyalty and encouraging repeat visits.

**Reduce Time to Market** 3D expedites product development, reducing time to market, ensuring agility to meet consumer demands promptly.

[Book a demo](https://www.missoun.com/contact-us)

![Item CAD](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/65657c4351f5031f3cf1b925_Marketing%20Tab.webp)

**Increase E-commerce Sales:**

**‍** Boost online sales through immersive 3D product experiences for customers.

**Precision with Guided Selling:** Eliminate order errors by guiding customers through accurate product configurations in 3D.

**Empower Dealers with Virtual Inventory:** Dealers sell beyond physical inventory, expanding offerings through 3D visualization.

**Amplify Sales Impact:** Equip your sales team to sell more effectively using the persuasive power of 3D.

**Lower Return Rates:** Reduce returns by ensuring customers confidently choose products through enhanced 3D views.

[Book a demo](https://www.missoun.com/contact-us)

![Variant management PLM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/65657c6197e151b908db1dca_Sales%20Tab.webp)

**Automated BOM Resolution:** Instantly resolve bills of materials for customer-defined configurations, saving time and effort compared to manual processes.

**Effortless Scheduling:** Automated production order creation enhances order scheduling, minimizing unplanned downtime and optimizing resource allocation for increased efficiency.

**Reduced Prep Time:** Automatically link resolved BOMs to production orders for seamless traceability, streamlining the entire production process.

**Avoid Production Issues:** Eliminate the risk of assembling incorrect components by automating BOM resolution and production order creation, ensuring accuracy in manufacturing.

**Reduce Inventory Issues:** Easily deactivate unavailable parts in configurations, preventing orders for undeliverable products and enhancing overall inventory management.

[Book a demo](https://www.missoun.com/contact-us)

![3D Configurator CPQ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/65657c9a72f80ca1702a04ba_Manufacturing%20Tab%201.webp)

## Bring visual immersive experience anywhere

Missoun platform boosts sales bringing life to virtual products.

![Bill of materials](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/65657d09b9576a75a4f8daee_Missoun-Architecture_2650.webp)

## Boost your ERP investment

Connect configurable product development and sales to planning, procurement and accounting processes.

Use Missoun to fully digitalise your business processes and maximise investments in your management system.

![Bill of materials resolution PLM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/63307645fa208d89168c00ce_missoun_bom_resolved.webp)

## Enterprise-grade architecture

Scalability, interoperability, and security are at the core of the Missoun platform.

Open

Designed with an APIs first approach to guarantee easy integration with existing systems.

![Open platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6342f6b4e3265c33ab45749d_lock-open-regular.svg)

Secure

Encrypt all data in transit and at-rest and run on ISO 27001 and SOC 1,2,3 certified cloud to protect intellectual property.

![Secure platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ee9efb1cef2819611bd1de/6342f6b44078362d67f20a5d_shield-regular.svg)
